adminAnalytics.pageDescription: Insights into user growth, engagement, and feature adoption.

userGrowth.title: User Growth Trends
userGrowth.description: New user signups over the selected period.

featureAdoption.title: Feature Adoption
featureAdoption.description: Total usage count for key platform features.

tenantLeaderboard.title: Tenant Leaderboard
tenantLeaderboard.description: Most active tenants by user count and activity score.

retention.title: User Retention by Signup Week
retention.description: Percentage of new users who returned in the weeks following their signup.

coinEconomy.title: Coin Economy
coinEconomy.description: Overview of the platform's virtual currency.
coinEconomy.spendingDescription: What users are spending their coins on.
coinEconomy.topUsersDescription: Most engaged users in the coin economy.
